title: Mercedes-Benz USA President and CEO on Electric Luxury
itunes:title: Mercedes-Benz USA President and CEO on Electric Luxury
description:
Mercedes-Benz USA President and CEO Dimitris Psillakis discusses the auto industry outlook, supply chain challenges and their line of electric vehicles.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
